title: LOL update download at 58KB/s
body:
It's really simple. Riot, please fix this.

58KB/s (700-800 minute ETA) although I have 200MB/s downstream bandwidth. Yes, it really is a problem with your servers. I killed the client a few times and eventually got blazing speeds and finished the 2.6GB download in a few sec.

Two words: load balance

Ask an engineer.

replies.body: If closing and reopening the client helped, it could have just been a simple unstable connection with the patching servers. Glad you finally got it worked out on your end though ^_^
